creator: lybarger999@gmail.com
text:
The return of the BuildEvent's "getProject" method is useless: one cannot seem
to retrieve even the "built-in" properties with it (ant.file, basedir, etc) nor
does the effects of "keep-going" reflect in the returned object.

I think that depends on which trigger is causing the event to be fired. It's
been a while since I've played with the event code, but IIRC certain triggers
may occur before the project is fully configured.

Can you provide more information on which listener method you are seeing this
problem in?
creator: carej@us.ibm.com

text:
If you are talking about the buildStarted event, then this is well known and intentional (setting properties causes messages to be sent, which shouldn't appear before buildStarted).

If you are talking about any other event, please reopen.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
